#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100003
#define eps  1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;

int main(){
	int t;
	int64 n,m;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n>m)
		swap(n,m);
		if(m==1){
			cout<<0<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		int64 ans=0;
		if(n==1){
			ans=1*min((int64)2,m)+2*max((int64)0,m-2);
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
		else{
			ans=min((int64)2,m)*(int64)(5*max(n-2,(int64)0)+3*min((int64)2,n));
			ans+=max((int64)0,m-2)*(int64)(5*min((int64)2,n)+8*max(n-2,(int64)0));
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
		}
	return 0;
}
